# loadGameActivityDefinitions(IDs:completionHandler:)

**Type Method**

Loads game activity definitions with the supplied App Store Connect identifiers.

## Declaration

class func loadGameActivityDefinitions(IDs activityDefinitionIDs: [String]?, completionHandler: @escaping ([GKGameActivityDefinition]?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
